recipe.title: Grilled Shrimp with Spicy Tamarind Dipping Sauce
ingredients: 8 wooden skewers, soaked in water 20 minutes
1/4 cup tamarind paste (found in Asian markets)
instructions: Heat grill on high. Thread 3 shrimp on each skewer; season with salt and pepper. Dipping sauce: Mix remaining ingredients in a bowl. Grill shrimp until cooked through, about 3 minutes per side. Serve with dipping sauce on the side.
